name: Childhood Absence Epilepsy
clinical_features: Abrupt onset and offset of impaired awareness
notes: EEG shows generalized 3 Hz spike-and-wave; background usually normal.

name: Idiopathic Generalized Epilepsy
clinical_features: Absence, myoclonic and/or generalized tonic-clonic seizures
notes: Includes CAE, JAE, JME and GTCA; patterns may vary in frequency and morphology.

name: West Syndrome (Infantile Spasms)
clinical_features: Onset typically in first year of life
